description: This file defines a class DbApp that extends InfraApp, providing methods to retrieve database connection parameters, some of which are placeholders or require implementation.

classes.name: DbApp
classes.description: A subclass of InfraApp that manages database connection parameters and constructs connection strings.

methods.name: get_db_user
methods.description: Returns the database user, either from the attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_password
methods.description: Returns the database password, either from the attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_database
methods.description: Returns the database name, either from the attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_driver
methods.description: Returns the database driver, either from the attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_host
methods.description: Placeholder method to get the database host; not implemented.

methods.name: get_db_port
methods.description: Placeholder method to get the database port; not implemented.

methods.name: get_db_connection
methods.description: Constructs and returns the full database connection string using available parameters.

methods.name: get_db_host_local
methods.description: Returns 'localhost' as the local database host.

methods.name: get_db_port_local
methods.description: Returns the local database port, referencing self.host_port.

methods.name: get_db_connection_local
methods.description: Constructs and returns a local database connection string.
